entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming light late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
